alert.note: Alert for Broadwater; Central and Southern Lewis and Clark; Jefferson (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 11 at 10:31PM MDT by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Lewis and Clark, northwestern Broadwater and northern Jefferson Counties through 1130 PM MDT... At 1031 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Basin, or near Boulder, moving northeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Helena, Boulder, East Helena, Basin, Montana City, Wickes, Alhambra, Corbin, Clancy and Jefferson City. This includes the following highways... Interstate 15 between mile markers 154 and 195. Highway 12 between mile markers 43 and 49. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
